metadata.title: CVE-2020-26950 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.description: In certain circumstances, the MCallGetProperty opcode can be emitted withunmet assumptions resulting in an exploitable use-after-free condition.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 82.0.3, Firefox ESR < 78.4.1, andThunderbird < 78.4.2.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
